program_name: Information Sciences and Technology for Aerospace Engineering, Minor

minor_requirements.c_required_policy: Grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor.
minor_requirements.uniqueness_policy: At least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).

options: AERSP 423 Introduction to Numerical Methods in Fluid Dynamics
AERSP 440 Introduction to Software Engineering for Aerospace Engineers
